title: EXT_primitive_voxels glTF Mesh Primitive extension
description: `EXT_primitive_voxels` extension for a primitive in a glTF model to indicate voxel-based volumetric data

shape.description: The index of the shape in `KHR_implicit_shapes` that the voxel grid adheres to.

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the voxel grid. The values are interpreted with respect to the shape indicated by `KHR_implicit_shapes`.

padding.description: The optional padding of the voxels.

noData.description: A plain JSON object, where each key corresponds to an existing semantic in the primitive's `attributes`, and each value is the attribute's `noData` value. A `noData` value represents missing data — also known as a sentinel value — wherever it appears.

additionalProperties.description: The `noData` value for the corresponding attribute. Array elements **MUST** follow the accessor's `componentType`, and its length must align with the accessor's `type`.
